sites.SitesApp.name: SitesApp
sites.SitesApp.doc: SitesApp Create and access Google Sites.

method.name: copySite
method.doc: Creates a new Site by copying an existing Site.

argument.name: domain
argument.doc: The Google Apps hosted domain (e.g. example.com)

argument.name: name
argument.doc: The webspace name found in the URL (e.g. mySite)

argument.name: site
argument.doc: The Site to copy from. This can either be a site or a template. If the parameter is an existing site then the entire contents of the site will be copied. If the given Site is a template, then a new Site is created based on that template.

method.name: createSite
method.doc: Creates a new Site.

argument.name: domain
argument.doc: The Google Apps hosted domain (e.g. example.com)

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the path name found in the URL (e.g. mySite)

method.name: getActivePage
method.doc: Returns the active page, if the script is hosted in a container, or null otherwise.

method.name: getActiveSite
method.doc: Returns the active container, if the script is hosted in a container, or null otherwise.

method.name: getAllSites
method.doc: Retrieves first page of Sites belonging to this domain.

argument.name: domain
argument.doc: The Google Apps hosted domain (e.g. example.com)

method.name: getAllSites
method.doc: Retrieves all Sites belonging to this domain.

argument.name: domain
argument.doc: The Google Apps hosted domain (e.g. example.com)

argument.name: start
argument.doc: the index of the first site to return

argument.name: max
argument.doc: the maximum number of results to return

method.name: getPageByUrl
method.doc: Retrieves a Page by url.

method.name: getSite
method.doc: Retrieves a Site for the given Google Site, if the user is a consumer who does not have a hosted domain.

argument.name: name
argument.doc: The webspace name found in the URL (e.g. mySite)

method.name: getSite
method.doc: Retrieves a Site for the given Google Site.

argument.name: domain
argument.doc: The Google Apps hosted domain (e.g. example.com)

argument.name: name
argument.doc: The webspace name found in the URL (e.g. mySite)

method.name: getSiteByUrl
method.doc: Retrieves a Site by url.

method.name: getSites
method.doc: Retrieves first page of Sites for a user, if the user is a consumer who does not have a hosted domain.

method.name: getSites
method.doc: Retrieves Sites for a user between the given bounds if the user is a consumer who does not have a hosted domain.

argument.name: start
argument.doc: the index of the first site to return

argument.name: max
argument.doc: the maximum number of results to return

method.name: getSites
method.doc: Retrieves first page of Sites belonging to this user in this domain.

argument.name: domain
argument.doc: The Google Apps hosted domain (e.g. example.com)

method.name: getSites
method.doc: Retrieves all Sites belonging to this user in this domain for the given range given.

argument.name: domain
argument.doc: The Google Apps hosted domain (e.g. example.com)

argument.name: start
argument.doc: the index of the first site to return

argument.name: max
argument.doc: the maximum number of results to return

sites.Attachment.name: Attachment
sites.Attachment.doc: Attachment A Sites Attachment such as a file attached to a page. Note that an Attachment is a Blob and can be used anywhere Blob input is expected. var filesPage = SitesApp.getSite('example.com', 'mysite').getChildByName("files"); var attachments = filesPage.getAttachments(); // DocsList.createFile accepts a blob input. Since an Attachment is just a blob, we can // just pass it directly to that method var file = DocsList.createFile(attachments[0]);

method.name: deleteAttachment
method.doc: Deletes this attachment.

method.name: getAs
method.doc: Return the data inside this object as a blob converted to the specified content type.

argument.name: contentType
argument.doc: the MIME type to convert to. For most blobs, 'application/pdf' is the only valid option. For images in BMP, GIF, JPEG, or PNG format, any of 'image/bmp', 'image/gif', 'image/jpeg', or 'image/png' are also valid.

method.name: getAttachmentType
method.doc: Return the type of this attachment (HOSTED or WEB).

method.name: getBlob
method.doc: Return the data inside this object as a blob.

method.name: getContentType
method.doc: Return the mime type of this attachment.

method.name: getDatePublished
method.doc: Return the date this attachment was first published.

method.name: getDescription
method.doc: Return the description of this attachment.

method.name: getLastUpdated
method.doc: Return the date this attachment was last updated.

method.name: getParent
method.doc: Get the parent page of this attachment.

method.name: getTitle
method.doc: Return the title of this attachment.

method.name: getUrl
method.doc: Return the download url for this attachment.

method.name: setContentType
method.doc: Set the mime type of this attachment.

method.name: setDescription
method.doc: Set the descripton of this attachment.

method.name: setFrom
method.doc: Set the actual data of this attachment.

method.name: setParent
method.doc: Set the parent page of this attachment.

method.name: setTitle
method.doc: Set the title of this attachment.

method.name: setUrl
method.doc: Sets the download url for this attachment.

sites.Column.name: Column
sites.Column.doc: Column A Sites Column - a column from a Sites List page.

method.name: deleteColumn
method.doc: Deletes this column.

method.name: getName
method.doc: Gets the name of this column.

method.name: getParent
method.doc: Returns the List Page this column belongs to.

method.name: setName
method.doc: Sets the name of this column.

sites.Comment.name: Comment
sites.Comment.doc: Comment A Comment attached to any Sites page.

method.name: deleteComment
method.doc: Deletes this comment.

method.name: getAuthorEmail
method.doc: Gets the email address of the author of this comment.

method.name: getAuthorName
method.doc: Gets the name of the author of this comment.

method.name: getContent
method.doc: Return the content of this comment as a String.

method.name: getDatePublished
method.doc: Return the date this comment was originally published.

method.name: getLastUpdated
method.doc: Return the date this comment was last updated.

method.name: getParent
method.doc: Get the parent page of this comment.

method.name: setContent
method.doc: Set the content of this comment.

method.name: setParent
method.doc: Set the parent page of this comment.

sites.ListItem.name: ListItem
sites.ListItem.doc: ListItem A Sites ListItem - a list element from a Sites List page.

method.name: deleteListItem
method.doc: Deletes this list item.

method.name: getDatePublished
method.doc: Return the date this list item was first published.

method.name: getLastUpdated
method.doc: Return the date this comment was last updated.

method.name: getParent
method.doc: Get the parent page of this list item.

method.name: getValueByIndex
method.doc: Get the value of this ListItem for a numbered column.

argument.name: index
argument.doc: the column to get the value of

method.name: getValueByName
method.doc: Get the value of this ListItem for a named column.

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the column to get the value of

method.name: setParent
method.doc: Set the parent page of this list item.

method.name: setValueByIndex
method.doc: Set the value of this ListItem for a numbered column.

argument.name: index
argument.doc: the column to set the value of

method.name: setValueByName
method.doc: Set the value of this ListItem for a numbered column.

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the column to set the value of

sites.Page.name: Page
sites.Page.doc: Page A Page on a Google Site.

method.name: addColumn
method.doc: Add a new column to the list.

method.name: addComment
method.doc: Add a comment to the page.

method.name: addHostedAttachment
method.doc: Add an attachment to the page.

method.name: addHostedAttachment
method.doc: Add an attachment to the page.

method.name: addListItem
method.doc: Add a list item to the list.

method.name: addWebAttachment
method.doc: Add a web attachment to the page.

argument.name: url
argument.doc: the url of the file being attached

method.name: createAnnouncement
method.doc: Create an announcements for this page.

method.name: createAnnouncement
method.doc: Create an announcements for this page.

argument.name: asDraft
argument.doc: whether to make the announcement a draft

method.name: createAnnouncementsPage
method.doc: Create a new announcements page.

method.name: createFileCabinetPage
method.doc: Create a new file-cabinet page.

method.name: createListPage
method.doc: Create a new list page.

argument.name: columnNames
argument.doc: the column names used for the list

method.name: createPageFromTemplate
method.doc: Create a new page from a template.

method.name: createWebPage
method.doc: Create a new web page.

method.name: deletePage
method.doc: Deletes this page.

method.name: getAllDescendants
method.doc: Gets an array of descendant pages (direct and indirect), up to a limit of 200 pages.

method.name: getAllDescendants
method.doc: Gets an array of descendant pages, with optional advanced arguments.

argument.name: options
argument.doc: JavaScript object fields defined in the Advanced Arguments section below

method.name: getAnnouncements
method.doc: Get the announcements for this page.

method.name: getAnnouncements
method.doc: Get the announcements for this page.

argument.name: optOptions
argument.doc: A JavaScript object containing advanced parameters

method.name: getAttachments
method.doc: Get the attachments for this page.

method.name: getAttachments
method.doc: Get the attachments for this page.

argument.name: optOptions
argument.doc: a JavaScript object containing optional parameters

method.name: getAuthors
method.doc: Get the emails of the authors of the page

method.name: getChildByName
method.doc: Gets a particular child page.

method.name: getChildren
method.doc: Gets an array of child pages, up to a limit of 200 pages.

method.name: getChildren
method.doc: Gets an array of child pages, with optional advanced arguments.

argument.name: options
argument.doc: JavaScript object fields defined in the Advanced Arguments section below

method.name: getColumns
method.doc: Get the columns for the list.

method.name: getComments
method.doc: Get the comments for this page.

method.name: getComments
method.doc: Get the comments for this page.

argument.name: optOptions
argument.doc: a JavaScript object containing optional parameters

method.name: getDatePublished
method.doc: Return the date this page was first published.

method.name: getHtmlContent
method.doc: Get the HTML content of the page.

method.name: getIsDraft
method.doc: Returns whether the page is in draft mode.

method.name: getLastEdited
method.doc: Return the last edit date, which includes only content edits.

method.name: getLastUpdated
method.doc: Return the last updated date, which includes non-content changes like moving.

method.name: getListItems
method.doc: Get the list items for the list.

method.name: getListItems
method.doc: Get the list items for the list.

argument.name: optOptions
argument.doc: A JavaScript object of optional parameters

method.name: getName
method.doc: Return the page's name.

method.name: getPageType
method.doc: Return the type of this page as a SitesApp.PageType enum.

method.name: getParent
method.doc: Return the parent of this page.

method.name: getTextContent
method.doc: Returns the plain-text page content.

method.name: getTitle
method.doc: Return the page's title.

method.name: getUrl
method.doc: Get the url of the page.

method.name: isDeleted
method.doc: Returns whether a page has been deleted.

method.name: isTemplate
method.doc: Returns whether this page is a copyable template.

method.name: publishAsTemplate
method.doc: Publish this page as a copyable template.

argument.name: name
argument.doc: The name of the new template

method.name: search
method.doc: Gets an array of descendant pages that match a search query, up to a limit of 200 pages.

argument.name: query
argument.doc: the full text search query to match

method.name: search
method.doc: Gets an array of descendant pages that match a search query, with optional advanced arguments.

argument.name: query
argument.doc: the full text search query to match

argument.name: options
argument.doc: JavaScript object fields defined in the Advanced Arguments section below

method.name: setHtmlContent
method.doc: Set the HTML content of the page.

method.name: setIsDraft
method.doc: Sets whether the page is in draft mode.

method.name: setName
method.doc: Set this page's name.

method.name: setParent
method.doc: Set the parent of this page.

method.name: setTitle
method.doc: Set the page's title.

sites.Site.name: Site
sites.Site.doc: Site An object representing a Google Site.

method.name: addEditor
method.doc: Adds the given user to the list of editors for the Site.

argument.name: emailAddress
argument.doc: the email address of the user to add

method.name: addEditor
method.doc: Adds the given user to the list of editors for the Site.

argument.name: user
argument.doc: a representation of the user to add

method.name: addEditors
method.doc: Adds the given array of users to the list of editors for the Site.

argument.name: emailAddresses
argument.doc: an array of email addresses of the users to add

method.name: addOwner
method.doc: Add a new owner to the website

argument.name: email
argument.doc: The email of the user to add as an owner

method.name: addOwner
method.doc: Add a new owner to the website

argument.name: user
argument.doc: The user to add as an owner

method.name: addViewer
method.doc: Adds the given user to the list of viewers for the Site.

argument.name: emailAddress
argument.doc: the email address of the user to add

method.name: addViewer
method.doc: Adds the given user to the list of viewers for the Site.

argument.name: user
argument.doc: a representation of the user to add

method.name: addViewers
method.doc: Adds the given array of users to the list of viewers for the Site.

argument.name: emailAddresses
argument.doc: an array of email addresses of the users to add

method.name: createAnnouncementsPage
method.doc: Create a new announcements page.

method.name: createFileCabinetPage
method.doc: Create a new file-cabinet page.

method.name: createListPage
method.doc: Create a new list page.

argument.name: columnNames
argument.doc: the column names used for the list

method.name: createPageFromTemplate
method.doc: Create a new page from a template.

method.name: createWebPage
method.doc: Create a new web page.

method.name: getAllDescendants
method.doc: Gets an array of descendant pages (direct and indirect), up to a limit of 200 pages.

method.name: getAllDescendants
method.doc: Gets an array of descendant pages, with optional advanced arguments.

argument.name: options
argument.doc: JavaScript object fields defined in the Advanced Arguments section below

method.name: getChildByName
method.doc: Gets a particular child page.

method.name: getChildren
method.doc: Gets an array of child pages, up to a limit of 200 pages.

method.name: getChildren
method.doc: Gets an array of child pages, with optional advanced arguments.

argument.name: options
argument.doc: JavaScript object fields defined in the Advanced Arguments section below

method.name: getEditors
method.doc: Gets the list of editors for this Site.

method.name: getName
method.doc: Return the name of the site

method.name: getOwners
method.doc: Retrieves list of owners for the site

method.name: getSummary
method.doc: Return the summary of the web site

method.name: getTemplates
method.doc: Returns all template pages.

method.name: getTheme
method.doc: Gets the theme of the site

method.name: getTitle
method.doc: Return the title of the site

method.name: getUrl
method.doc: Retrieves the url of this Site.

method.name: getViewers
method.doc: Gets the list of viewers and commenters for this Site.

method.name: removeEditor
method.doc: Removes the given user from the list of editors for the Site.

argument.name: emailAddress
argument.doc: the email address of the user to remove

method.name: removeEditor
method.doc: Removes the given user from the list of editors for the Site.

argument.name: user
argument.doc: a representation of the user to remove

method.name: removeOwner
method.doc: Removes owner from the site by user email

argument.name: email
argument.doc: The email of the user to remove from the owners

method.name: removeOwner
method.doc: Removes owner from the site

argument.name: user
argument.doc: A user to remove from the list of owners

method.name: removeViewer
method.doc: Removes the given user from the list of viewers and commenters for the Site.

argument.name: emailAddress
argument.doc: the email address of the user to remove

method.name: removeViewer
method.doc: Removes the given user from the list of viewers and commenters for the Site.

argument.name: user
argument.doc: a representation of the user to remove

method.name: search
method.doc: Gets an array of descendant pages that match a search query, up to a limit of 200 pages.

argument.name: query
argument.doc: the full text search query to match

method.name: search
method.doc: Gets an array of descendant pages that match a search query, with optional advanced arguments.

argument.name: query
argument.doc: the full text search query to match

argument.name: options
argument.doc: JavaScript object fields defined in the Advanced Arguments section below

method.name: setSummary
method.doc: Set the summary of the web site

argument.name: summary
argument.doc: A string summary describing the site

method.name: setTheme
method.doc: Sets the theme of the site Theme must be a valid theme string.

argument.name: theme
argument.doc: a string name for the theme to set for this Site

method.name: setTitle
method.doc: Set the title of the site

argument.name: title
argument.doc: the new title of the site

sites.AttachmentType.name: AttachmentType
sites.AttachmentType.doc: AttachmentType A typesafe enum for sites attachment type.

sites.PageType.name: PageType
sites.PageType.doc: PageType A typesafe enum for sites page type.
